reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate of major congenital eye abnormalities: congenital cataracts (~50 per 100k births), congenital glaucoma (~20 per 100k births), retinoblastoma (~3 per 100k births), optic nerve hypoplasia (~15 per 100k births), other ocular malformations (~62 per 100k births) = ~150 per 100k live births. Heterogeneous umbrella term with varying clinical significance and epidemiology across subcategories.
